title: Low viscosity and low temperature curing reactive POSS/epoxy hybrid resin with enhanced toughness and comprehensive thermal performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7263-7275
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08390J, Paper
Open Access

Ruiyan Han, Xiaoyan Ma, Lifeng Cai, Zongwu Zhang, Yiliang Fang, Jian Wang
Leveraging the unique structure and exceptional properties of POSS, this study prepared a high-performance epoxy resin capable of low-temperature curing.
